Collapsible container built over the collapse directive and styled to fit our needs.

Usage:


                <uib-accordion close-others="oneAtATime">
                    <uib-accordion-group is-open="status.isFirstOpen">
                        <xui-accordion-heading>status</xui-accordion-heading>

                        <xui-checkbox ng-model="vm.elements.value1">Down</xui-checkbox>
                        <xui-checkbox ng-model="vm.elements.value2">Critical</xui-checkbox>
                        <xui-checkbox ng-model="vm.elements.value3">Warning</xui-checkbox>
                        <xui-checkbox ng-model="vm.elements.value4">Ok</xui-checkbox>
                    </uib-accordion-group>

                    <uib-accordion-group>
                        <xui-accordion-heading>vendor</xui-accordion-heading>

                        <xui-checkbox ng-model="vm.elements.value5">Cisco</xui-checkbox>
                        <xui-checkbox ng-model="vm.elements.value6">HP</xui-checkbox>
                        <xui-checkbox ng-model="vm.elements.value7">Juniper</xui-checkbox>
                    </uib-accordion-group>
                </uib-accordion>
accordion Attributes:
close-others Boolean value which controls whether expanding an item will cause the other items to close. Default value: false
accordion-group Attributes:
is-open Whether accordion group is open or closed.. Default value: false
heading Set the clickable text on the group's header. Default value: none NOTICE: Using this instead of xui-accordion-heading will not add the caret.

Code samples

status Down Critical Warning Ok vendor Cisco HP Juniper
